text: evarkaḷ īmāṉ koṇṭu, avarkaḷuṭaiya cantatiyārum īmāṉil avarkaḷaip piṉ toṭarkiṟārkaḷō, avarkaḷuṭaiya anta cantatiyaṉarai avarkaḷuṭaṉ (cuvaṉattil oṉṟu) cērttu viṭuvōm. (Itaṉāl) avarkaḷuṭaiya ceyalkaḷil enta oṉṟaiyum, nām avarkaḷukkuk kuṟaittu viṭa māṭṭōm - ovvoru maṉitaṉum tāṉ campātitta ceyalkaḷukkup piṇaiyāka irukkiṉṟāṉ
